name: part_007
file: tmp_【チラ見せ枠_NIGHT】ときのそら New Year’s Party 2026『Dreams in Motion』 [ko7ypXM_-yQ]_gemini-3-pro-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: End of song, transition to MC segment.
MC segment: Penlight interaction, hydration talk, and announcement of free stream ending.
Start of the next song performance.
End card appears notifying the end of the free broadcast.

subtitles.original: う〜ん、一回席！
subtitles.english: Hmm, first floor seats!

subtitles.original: イェ〜イ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: じゃあまたペンライト遊びしちゃお。
subtitles.english: Well then, let's play with penlights again.

subtitles.original: 左の人、緑！
subtitles.english: People on the left, green!

subtitles.original: 右の人は、じゃあ...オレンジ！
subtitles.english: People on the right, well then... orange!

subtitles.original: じゃあ、真ん中は...青！
subtitles.english: Then, the center... blue!

subtitles.original: うわ〜綺麗だ！
subtitles.english: Wow, it's beautiful!

subtitles.original: みんな今回はね、こんな感じで、みんなも演出に参加しちゃうライブになっているよ。
subtitles.english: Everyone, this time, it's a concert where you all get to participate in the production like this.

subtitles.original: みんなで楽しんでいこうね！
subtitles.english: Let's all have fun together!

subtitles.original: 今日はみんなも主役なんだ！
subtitles.english: Today, everyone is a main character too!

subtitles.original: は〜い！
subtitles.english: Ye~s!

subtitles.original: よし、よし、よし... よし！から！
subtitles.english: Alright, alright, alright... Alright! Starting now!

subtitles.original: 夜はね、いっぱい動くと思って、
subtitles.english: I thought I'd be moving a lot tonight,

subtitles.original: ま、もう動いてるけど、昼から飲めばよかった。
subtitles.english: well, I'm already moving, but I should've started drinking it at noon.

subtitles.original: スポドリ一択！
subtitles.english: Sports drink is the only choice!

subtitles.original: ガッツリ！
subtitles.english: Plenty!

subtitles.original: 今日、今年の目標みたいにムキムキになっていこうと思います。
subtitles.english: Today, I think I'll get buff, just like my goal for this year.

subtitles.original: 頑張れ！
subtitles.english: Do your best!

subtitles.original: というわけで？
subtitles.english: With that said?

subtitles.original: じゃ〜ん、初めての人！
subtitles.english: Ta-da! Any first-timers here?

subtitles.original: あ、これ、拍手してくれてる、ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Ah, you're clapping for me here, thank you.

subtitles.original: 一番最初のライブから全部来てるよって人いる？
subtitles.english: Is there anyone who has come to every live since the very first one?

subtitles.original: おお〜！ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Ooh! Thank you very much.

subtitles.original: というわけでね、みんなわかったね、はじめましての人も
subtitles.english: So, you get it right? First-timers too,

subtitles.original: いつもは「そらとも」じゃない人も
subtitles.english: and those who aren't usually 'Soratomo' too,

subtitles.original: そして昔から応援してる人、みんな集まって
subtitles.english: and those who have supported me for a long time, gather together,

subtitles.original: みんなが...既に「そらとも」だよ！
subtitles.english: everyone... is already a 'Soratomo'!

subtitles.original: みんな楽しく過ごしていこうね！
subtitles.english: Let's all have a fun time!

subtitles.original: というわけで...なんと...
subtitles.english: So... actually...

subtitles.original: YouTubeでの無料配信は...
subtitles.english: the free stream on YouTube is...

subtitles.original: まだ全部言ってないのに！
subtitles.english: I haven't even said it all yet!

subtitles.original: ここ... ここまで！
subtitles.english: Here... ends here!

subtitles.original: まだ来たばっかり！？
subtitles.english: Just got here!?

subtitles.original: まだ来たばっかりかと思うけど
subtitles.english: I think you might have just got here, but

subtitles.original: ま、続きは概要欄から...え、え、イェーイ...え、イェーイの人はどうしたの？
subtitles.english: well, continue from the description... eh, eh, yay... eh, what's up with the 'yay' people?

subtitles.original: ごめん！
subtitles.english: Sorry!

subtitles.original: あ、コメント会場、配信会場の人も楽しんでってね！
subtitles.english: Ah, people in the comments and stream, have fun too!

subtitles.original: わ〜い！
subtitles.english: Ya~y!

subtitles.original: それでは、もう一回飲んでから行くね。
subtitles.english: Well then, I'll take one more drink before we go.

subtitles.original: ちょっと水分も大事。
subtitles.english: Hydration is important.

subtitles.original: 助かる！助かってくれてありがとう！
subtitles.english: It helps! Thanks for saying it helps!

subtitles.original: では、次の曲も楽しんで行ってね！
subtitles.english: Well then, please enjoy the next song too!

subtitles.original: まだほんのちょっとの涙流して
subtitles.english: Shedding just a little bit more tears

subtitles.original: 冒頭無料配信はこちらで終了です。
subtitles.english: The introductory free stream ends here.
